definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ct So 1:2 beloved, love (pl.), uncle (NH id., Syr. dodo0, dod; As. dâdu Dl:HA 19)—abs. [[דּוֹד]] Ct So 5:9, So 5:9; cstr. [[דּוֹד]] 1Sa 10:14 + 3 t.; [[דּׂד]] Le 10:4 Es 2:15; sf. [[דּוֹדִי]] Is 5:1 (but cf. infr.) + 26 t. all Ct; [[דּׂדִי]] Je 32:8 + 2 t.; [[דּׂדְךָ]] Je 32:7; [[דּוֹדֵח]] Ct So 5:9, So 5:9 + 2 t.; [[דּוֹדוֹ]] Am 6:10, 1Sa 10:16, [[דּׂדוֹ]] Le 20:20 + 4 t.; [[דּוֹדָהּ]] Ct So 8:5; pl. [[דּוֹדִים]] Ct So 5:1; [[דּׂדִים]] Pr 7:18, Ez Eze 16:8, Eze 23:17; pl. sf. [[דּׂדַי]] Ct So 7:13; [[דּׂדֶיךָ]] Ct So 1:2, So 1:4; [[דּׂדַיִח]] Ct So 4:10, So 4:10; [[דּׂדֵיהֶןָ]] Nu 36:11—

most often loved one, beloved (lover, betrothed) Ct So 1:13, So 1:14, So 1:16, So 2:3, So 2:8, So 2:9, So 2:10, So 2:16, So 2:17, So 4:16, So 5:2, So 5:4, So 5:5, So 5:6, So 5:6, So 5:8, So 5:9, So 5:9, So 5:10, So 5:16, So 6:1, So 6:1, So 6:2, So 6:3, So 6:3, So 7:10, So 7:11, So 7:12, So 7:14, So 8:5, So 8:14; beloved one, friend, [[שִׁירַת דּוֹדִי]] Is 5:1 (where Lo Che [[דודים]] ´[[שׁ]] love-song, v.

specif. uncle, Le 10:4 (father's brother, patruus; Syr. = also avunculus) Nu 36:11, 1Sa 14:50, 2Ki 24:17, Le 20:20, Le 25:49, Le 25:49, 1Sa 10:14, 1Sa 10:15, 1Sa 10:16, Es 2:7, Es 2:15, Je 32:7, Je 32:8, Je 32:9, Je 32:12; perhaps also 1Ch 27:32 Jonathan, David's [[דּוֹד]] so AVRV; = kinsman (?, so St RVm) Am 6:10.
pl. abstr. love Pr 7:18, Ct So 1:2, So 1:4, So 4:10, So 4:10, So 5:1, (So 5:1 al. concr. beloved ones, so AVRV, LXX a)delfui); so [[עֵר דדים]] Ez Eze 16:8; [[מִשְׁכַּב דדים]] Ez Eze 23:17.
